data.title: A Wolf in Love with Love — Ships
data.meta_description: Ships What follows are lists of couples I ship (or have shipped at some point and still have soft spots for). I’m nowhere near done with the list, so bear with me. It’s a solid mix of canon and...
data.text:
What follows are lists of couples I ship (or have shipped at some point and still have soft spots for). I’m nowhere near done with the list, so bear with me. It’s a solid mix of canon and not-canon, and I don’t limit my interests to just sexual and / or romantic relationships.

Current Top Ships:

Wei Wuxian / Lan Wangji (The Untamed)

Crowley / Aziraphale, aka Crowziraphale (Good Omens; any kind of relationship)

Steve Rogers (Captain America) / Bucky Barnes (The Winter Soldier), aka Stucky (Marvel Cinematic Universe)

Sherlock Holmes / Watson, aka Sherwatsonlock (any version, any kind of relationship, but especially Sherlock)

Maleficent / Diaval (Maleficent)

Reylo / ReyBen (Star Wars)

Stormpilot (Finn / Poe, Star Wars)

Jedi Stormpilot (Rey / Finn / Poe, Star Wars)

Thomas Barrow / Richard Ellis (Downton Abbey)

Eliot Waugh / Quentin Coldwater (The Magicians)

Hordak / Entrapta (She-Ra and the Princesses of Power)

Harringrove (Steve / Billy, Stranger Things)

Other ships I adore:

Kylie Griffin / Eduardo Rivera (Extreme Ghostbusters)

Rogue / Gambit (Remy LeBeau) (X-Men franchise)

Agron / Nasir (aka Nagron, Spartacus)

Buffy Summers / Spike (William) (Buffy the Vampire Slayer)

Daniel Jackson / Vala Mal Doran (Stargate SG-1)

Rodney McKay / John Sheppard, aka McShep (Stargate Atlantis)

Rapunzel / Eugene Fitzherbert (Flynn Rider) (Tangled)

Kara Danvers (Zor-El) / Mon-El (Supergirl)

Ranma Saotome / Akane Tendou (Ranma Nibun no Ichi / Ranma ½)

Ron Weasley / Hermione Granger, aka The Good Ship and HeRon (Harry Potter)

Harry Potter / Ginny Weasley (Harry Potter)

Tony Stark / Pepper Potts, aka Pepperony (Marvel Cinematic Universe)

Rose / The 9th Doctor (Doctor Who)

Rei Kashino / Kira Aso (MARS)

Sophie / Howl (Howl’s Moving Castle)

Kate / Garrett (Twilight)

Spider-Man / Deadpool, aka Spideypool (Marvel Comics)

Peter Parker (Spider-Man) / Mary Jane Watson (MJ) (Spider-Man franchise)

Scarlett / Snake-Eyes (GI Joe franchise)

Special Mentions (I never got around to actually doing any fics or art for these ships, and haven’t gotten hugely into their fandoms, but I still adore them):

Fred / Wesley (Angel: The Series)

Todd Manning / Blair Cramer (One Life to Live)

Jaenelle Angelline / Daemon Sa Diablo (The Black Jewells)

Stiles Stillinski / Derek Hale, aka Sterek (Teen Wolf)

Edward Elric / Winry Rockbell (Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood)

Angela Montenegro / Hodgins (Bones)

Harry Potter / Draco Malfoy, aka Drarry (Harry Potter)

Harry Potter / Ron Weasley (Harry Potter)

Sheila / Joel (Santa Clarita Diet)

Inuyasha / Kagome Higurashi (Inuyasha)

Kiara / Kovu (The Lion King 2: Simba’s Pride)

Bruce Wayne / Selina Kyle (Batman franchise)

Lucian / Sonja (Underworld)

Mary Margaret (Snow White) / David (Prince Charming) (Once Upon a Time)

Rumpelstiltskin (Mr Gold) / Belle, aka Rumpbelle (Once Upon a Time)

Jo Lupo / Zane Donovan (Eureka)

R / Julie (Warm Bodies)

Jake Riley / Katie Frank (Containment)

Jack Skellington / Sally (Nightmare Before Christmas)

Lady / The Tramp (Lady and the Tramp)

Threesomes (or more) I root for (OT3s have more fun!):

Harry / Ron / Hermione (Harry Potter)

Rey / Finn / Poe (Star Wars)

Steve Rogers / Bucky Barnes / Peggy Carter (Marvel Cinematic Universe)

Steve Rogers / Bucky Barnes / Sam Wilson (Marvel Cinematic Universe)

Cal Leandros / Noki Leandros / Robin Goodfellow (Cal Leandros)

Kirk/ Spock / McCoy (Star Trek)

Napoleon Solo / Illya Kuryakin / Gaby (The Man From UNCLE - film)

Remus Lupin / Sirius Black / James Potter (Harry Potter)

Archie / Jughead / Betty / Veronica (Archie Comics AND Riverdale)

Notably Non-Sexual (ie, familial, friendly, or platonic [as deeply in love as if married, but not sexual]) Ships I adore (even if in some cases I would also enjoy them being physically intimate):

Cutter / Skywise (Elfquest)

The Tenth Doctor / Simm!Master (Doctor Who)

Oswald Cobblepot / Edward Nygma (I call them Origami Penguin) (Gotham)

Topher Brink / Adelle DeWitt (Dollhouse)

Harry Potter / Ron Weasley (Harry Potter)

Cal Leandros / Niko Leandros / Robin Goodfellow (Cal Leandros - sexual in past lives)

Harry Dresden / Thomas Raith (Dresden Files)

Emma Swan / Regina (The Evil Queen) (Once Upon a Time)

Peggy Carter / Edward Jarvis (Agent Carter)

Judy Hopps / Nick Wilde (Zootopia)

Mon-El / Winn Schott (Supergirl)

Harry Houdini / Arthur Conan Doyle (Houdini & Doyle)

Damon Salvatore / Alaric Saltzman (The Vampire Diaries)

Damon Salvatore / Enzo St. John (The Vampire Diaries)

Damon Salvatore / Stefan Salvatore (The Vampire Diaries)

Odo / Quark (Star Trek: Deep Space Nine)

Natasha Romanov / Clint Barton (Marvel Cinematic Universe)

Sherlock Holmes / Mary Mortsan

Other Ships (of varying kinds, both romantic and/or sexual and not) I like (even if I’m not suuuuper-passionate about them *right now*):

Loki / Leah (Marvel Comics)

Loki / Verity (Marvel Comics)

Loki / Fandral (Marvel)

Loki / Thor, aka Thorki (Marvel)

Betty / Jughead, aka Bughead (Riverdale)

Yataka / Kannagi (Arata: The Legend)

Emma Swan / Killian Jones (Captain Hook) (Once Upon a Time)

Aeryn Sun / John Crichton (Farscape)

Scarlet Witch / Vision (Marvel Cinematic Universe)

Data / Tasha Yar (Star Trek: The Next Generation)
